basics.name: Anh Ngoc Nguyen
basics.label: Student
basics.summary: I am currently an undergraduate student at the University of Hawaiʻi at Mānoa double majoring in Cinematic Arts - Animation (B.A) and Computer Science - Creative Computational Media (B.A). I expect to graduate in Spring 2026.

education.institution: University of Hawaiʻi at Mānoa, Honolulu, HI
education.area: Cinematic Arts - Animation, Computer Science - Creative Computational Media (expected Spring, 2026)

highlights: Engaged with guests about wardrobe and lifestyle choices through product education and transactions
Outreached to clients about events and product releases to maintain consumer relations
Delegated tasks, maintained inventory, financial transactions, opened/closed the store
Assisted customers with needs while upkeeping store standards/policies

volunteer.summary: Designer, videographer, and 3D modeler for various data visualization projects
highlights: Designed graphics for various advertisements, user manual guides, and produced/edited videos for educational distribution
Assisted in creating and texturing multiple 3D models for a virtual reality app in collaboration with the Hawaii State Energy Office (HSEO)

awards.title: Emerging Filmmaker Award (2)
awards.awarder: University of Hawaiʻi at Mānoa School of Cinematic Arts
awards.summary: Award given to a student who submitted a short film into the annual School of Cinematic Arts Showcase showing a great amount of potential and ambition based on quality of effort.

awards.title: Voices of Champions Film Contest 1st Place Winner
awards.summary: 1st place winner in a local film contest dedicated to entertain, educate and energize audiences to take action in the face of climate change-induced threats to our coastal communities.

awards.title: B+ Scholarship
awards.summary: Scholarships awarded to incoming freshmen and continuing students who complete a rigorous high school curriculum with a minimum overall GPA of 3.0 at a Hawai'i public school.

awards.title: Mānoa Academic Merit Scholarship
awards.awarder: University of Hawaiʻi at Mānoa Office of Admissions
awards.summary: Scholarship designed to recognize the academic strengths of first-year, degree-seeking students who enroll at UH Mānoa, is awarded at the start of the student’s Mānoa degree pursuit and is intended to support the student’s enrollment for 4 years.
